mapper.sql: templetid, uuid, orgid, name, snapshot, ratio, height, width, bgcolor, bgimageid, touchflag, homeflag, hometempletid, homeidletime, description, status, publicflag, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select: select from templet where status=1 and hometempletid = #{hometempletid}
mapper.insert:
